data.title: Carmelo Anthony
data.meta_description: Get the latest carmelo anthony news, articles, videos and photos on the New York Post.
data.text:
Today's Iconic Moment in NY Sports History: Carmelo Anthony re-signs with the Knicks on a 5-year, $124M deal

Carmelo Anthony came to the Knicks from the Denver Nuggets ahead of the 2011 trade deadline after a season that saw him set the franchise record for points in a...

Carmelo Anthony reveals unknown part of Linsanity: '$100 million' denial

Carmelo Anthony and Baron Davis said they tried to get Jeremy Lin on board with turning Linsanity into a a cash cow, but he wanted no part of it.

Today's Iconic Moment in New York Sports: Carmelo Anthony captures NBA's scoring title

April 17, 2013: Carmelo Anthony becomes the first Knick to win the NBA's scoring title since Bernard King accomplished the feat in 1985.

Today's Iconic Moment in New York Sports: Phil Jackson becomes president of the Knicks

March 18, 2014: Phil Jackson signs a five-year contract to become president of basketball operations for the New York Knicks.

Carmelo Anthony glad Knicks mended this key relationship

Carmelo Anthony fully endorses the recent thawing of the cold war between the Knicks and LeBron’s agency, Klutch Sports.

Carmelo Anthony still floored by first George Karl interaction: 'Going to have issues'

Carmelo Anthony appeared on the "7pm to Brooklyn" podcast and was reminiscing on how the two had a conflict-filled relationship that started that way from the jump.

Today's Iconic Moment in New York Sports: Carmelo Anthony's 62-point game

January 24, 2014: Knicks superstar Carmelo Anthony scores a Madison Square Garden and franchise record 62-points to lead New York past the Charlotte Bobcats and snap the 'Bockers five-game losing...

Knicks veteran has solid outing in return from knee injury

Josh Hart showed signs Saturday night of the impactful player and prized in-season addition to the Knicks from one year ago.

Carmelo Anthony: Nuggets gave Nikola Jokic No. 15 to 'erase' me

The relationship between Carmelo Anthony and the Nuggets organization appears to still have some open wounds.

Carmelo Anthony saw enough of RJ Barrett's 'bland' Knicks tenure

When his co-host brought up Barrett’s personality, Anthony interjected with “bland” before explaining why OG Anunoby is a better fit for the Knicks.

Veteran gives Knicks 'energy' after unlikely return

Just about a week after he was plucked from near retirement, Gibson has been thrust into action and came through on Christmas.

Why Carmelo Anthony urged Damian Lillard to 'get the f--k out' of Portland

Anthony advised Lillard to get out before "the narrative changed" and the Blazers fans turned against him in a rebuild.

Carmelo Anthony tried to get Knicks to draft this budding star in 2020

Carmelo Anthony hadn’t played with the Knicks for three seasons, but he still wanted his former team to draft Tyrese Haliburton.

Carmelo Anthony, son Kiyan rep Syracuse jerseys during recruiting visit

Carmelo Anthony played one season at Syracuse and led the school to its only national title.

Carmelo Anthony to headline 2024 New York City Basketball Hall of Fame

Carmelo Anthony is headlining the 2024 class of the revamped New York City Basketball Hall of Fame, The Post has learned.

Knicks legend predicted Josh Hart would be 'perfect' fit in NYC

Josh Hart said he was told a few years ago by a former Knicks All-Star that he and New York would be a “perfect” match.

The case against retiring Carmelo Anthony's Knicks jersey in the MSG rafters

There has been talk of Carmelo Anthony entering what has become a pretty exclusive club.
